verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon their <S%H4904>beds<s%>! when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> is <S%H216>light<s%>, they <S%H6213>practise<s%> <S%H3426>it<s%>, because it is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And they <S%H2530>covet<s%> <S%H7704>fields<s%>, and <S%H1497>seize<s%> <S%H1004>them<s%>; and houses, and take them <S%H5375>away<s%>: and they <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%>, even a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H5159>heritage<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H4940>Behold<s%>, against this family do I <S%H2803>devise<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%>, from which ye shall not <S%H4185>remove<s%> your <S%H6677>necks<s%>, neither shall ye <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H7317>haughtily<s%>; for it is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall they take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> against <S%H5091>you<s%>, and lament with a <S%H5093>doleful<s%> <S%H5092>lamentation<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, We are <S%H7703>utterly<s%> <S%H7703>ruined<s%>: he <S%H4171>changeth<s%> the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>: how doth he <S%H4185>remove<s%> it from <S%H7725>me<s%>! to the rebellious he <S%H2505>divideth<s%> our <S%H7704>fields<s%>.
Therefore thou shalt have none that shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H2256>line<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Prophesy <S%H5197><s%> ye <S%H5197>not<s%>, thus they prophesy. They shall not <S%H5197>prophesy<s%> to <S%H3639>these<s%>: reproaches shall not <S%H5253>depart<s%>.

Shall it be <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Is the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7114>straitened<s%>? are these his <S%H4611>doings<s%>? Do not my <S%H1697>words<s%> do <S%H3190>good<s%> to him that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H3477>uprightly<s%>?

But of <S%H865>late<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> is risen <S%H6965>up<s%> as an <S%H341>enemy<s%>: ye <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H145>robe<s%> from <S%H4136>off<s%> the <S%H8008>garment<s%> from them that <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H983>securely<s%> as men <S%H7725>averse<s%> from <S%H4421>war<s%>.

The <S%H802>women<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> ye cast <S%H1644>out<s%> from their <S%H8588>pleasant<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>; from their young <S%H5768>children<s%> ye take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1926>glory<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H3212>ye<s%>, and depart; for this is not your <S%H4496>resting-place<s%>; because of <S%H2930>uncleanness<s%> that <S%H2254>destroyeth<s%>, even with a <S%H4834>grievous<s%> <S%H2254>destruction<s%>.

If <S%H3863><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> do <S%H3576>lie<s%>, <S%H5197>saying<s%>, I will prophesy unto thee of <S%H3196>wine<s%> and of strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>; he shall even be the <S%H5197>prophet<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>.

I will <S%H622>surely<s%> <S%H622>assemble<s%>, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, all of <S%H6908>thee<s%>; I will surely <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I will <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H3162>together<s%> as the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H1223>Bozrah<s%>, as a <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of their <S%H1699>pasture<s%>; they shall make great <S%H1949>noise<s%> by reason of the multitude of <S%H120>men<s%>.

The <S%H6555>breaker<s%> is gone <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6555>them<s%>: they have broken forth and passed <S%H5674>on<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and are gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4428>thereat<s%>; and their king is <S%H5674>passed<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, and Jehovah at the head of <S%H7218>them<s%>.
